manager.name: Will Hieronymus
manager.vibe: Calculated and strategic, he sees the game as a puzzle to be solved — every play, every matchup, every season is part of the master plan.

logo.alt: A futuristic 49ers player under a glowing brain with neon play diagrams swirling in the sky.

logo_history.alt: A futuristic 49ers player under a glowing brain with neon play diagrams swirling in the sky.

name: I Pooped out of my Butker
tagline: The throne is mine, and I’m not giving it up.

manager.name: Jacob Gresham
manager.vibe: Irreverent and shameless, he thrives on stirring the pot while sitting comfortably on his throne of chaos and trophies.

logo.alt: A cartoonish crowned Chiefs player sitting proudly on a golden toilet.

logo_history.alt: A cartoonish crowned Chiefs player sitting proudly on a golden toilet.

name: Raise The Jolly Rodger
tagline: Cutthroat on Sundays, merciless every other day.

manager.name: Mike Clayton
manager.vibe: A swaggering pirate on the fantasy seas, fearless in raids and unbothered by storms, always looking to plunder points from rivals.

logo.alt: A pirate-inspired skull-and-crossed-swords design with a mustachioed face replacing the skull.

logo_history.alt: A pirate-inspired skull-and-crossed-swords design with a mustachioed face replacing the skull.

manager.name: Ross Grier
manager.vibe: The wild card prophet — unpredictable, lightning-charged, and just unhinged enough to pull off the impossible.

logo.alt: A Panthers player stands atop a glowing mushroom under stormy skies, lightning crackling all around.

logo_history.alt: A Panthers player stands atop a glowing mushroom under stormy skies, lightning crackling all around.

name: The Champ
tagline: Glory shines brightest under the rainbow.

manager.name: Lindol French
manager.vibe: Joyful but ruthless, he basks in glory with a trophy in one hand and his rivals' broken dreams in the other.

logo.alt: A triumphant 49ers player kneels on the field, raising a Lombardi trophy under a radiant rainbow arch.

logo_history.alt: A triumphant 49ers player kneels on the field, raising a Lombardi trophy under a radiant rainbow arch.

manager.name: Blake Walmsley
manager.vibe: The slick dealmaker — all contracts, confidence, and cold cash; victory is always just another negotiation away.

logo.alt: A smiling agent in a sharp suit leans back at his desk, stacks of money surrounding him, with Cowboys memorabilia in the background.

logo_history.alt: A smiling agent in a sharp suit leans back at his desk, stacks of money surrounding him, with Cowboys memorabilia in the background.

name: December
tagline: When the frost bites, the bear strikes.

manager.name: Donavan Harter
manager.vibe: Chaotic and untamed, a storm in the form of a polar bear; thrives when the cold sets in and the pressure is highest.

logo.alt: A fierce polar bear in 49ers gear, with a jerry curl mane, stands over the helmets of defeated opponents.

logo_history.alt: A fierce polar bear in 49ers gear, with a jerry curl mane, stands over the helmets of defeated opponents.

manager.name: Brandon Jones
manager.vibe: A grim northern warlord, armored in red and gold, forever marching through the snow toward conquest.

logo.alt: A 49ers warrior in furs and armor stands in the snow, football and shield in hand, with the text 'King of da Norf.'

logo_history.alt: A 49ers warrior in furs and armor stands in the snow, football and shield in hand, with the text 'King of da Norf.'

name: Spiders
tagline: If you're not first, you're last

manager.name: Matthew Spivey
manager.vibe: Fast, aggressive, and venomous — once he’s in motion, you’re already caught in the web.

logo.alt: A mechanical spider with a Ravens-themed body, built from a football, races down a road toward the end zone.

logo_history.alt: A mechanical spider with a Ravens-themed body, built from a football, races down a road toward the end zone.

name: A.J.’s Endzone Express
tagline: Loyal to the flock, lethal on the field.

manager.name: Vince Giancarlo
manager.vibe: Disciplined and loyal, but always circling like a predator — swooping down on mistakes with ruthless precision.

logo.alt: An eagle in a fedora clutches a football, wings spread wide, exuding menace and loyalty.

logo_history.alt: An eagle in a fedora clutches a football, wings spread wide, exuding menace and loyalty.

name: @TheRealBangBus
tagline: Two bulldogs, one mission: break the leash.

manager.name: Nick Banegas
manager.vibe: Chaotic fun embodied, his sideline Frenchies call the plays with grit and humor; equal parts bite and bark.

logo.alt: Two brindle French bulldogs dressed as 49ers coaches with headsets and clipboards, standing on the sideline.

logo_history.alt: Two brindle French bulldogs dressed as 49ers coaches with headsets and clipboards, standing on the sideline.

manager.name: William Montgomery
manager.vibe: Steady and confident, the original gold standard; carries himself with the calm assurance of a man who knows he’s already proven everything.

logo.alt: A portrait-style image of Michael Irvin holding a championship belt, dressed in Cowboys gear.

logo_history.alt: A portrait-style image of Michael Irvin holding a championship belt, dressed in Cowboys gear.
